articles.description: The mutated virus strain detected in the United Kingdom has forced as many as 80 countries to shut their borders to the island nation.
articles.content: New strains of COVID-19 have caused alarm and concern in the United Kingdom and South Africa, with many people worried the mutations could complicate vaccine efforts that have only recently gotten un… [+2632 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Lurye
articles.title: City of Hartford orders its first batch of COVID-19 vaccines, plans for roll-out to residents - Hartford Courant
articles.description: Hartford has placed its first order for 300 Moderna COVID-19 vaccines, and outfitted its health department with refrigerators to store them in, as the city plans for the much-anticipated roll-out to employees and residents.
